content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates (contains 48 iron ore and is out of fuel).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates (fueled with 2 coal, produced 6 copper plates, and is awaiting ingredients).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research with input {automation-science-pack: 10} and status NO_POWER.
- ElectricityGroup with id=13488 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”] and status NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) holding ~199.97 units of water at 15°C with warning “out of fuel” (now operating with fluid_system [51020]).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) holding ~99.86 units of water at 15°C and status WORKING.
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51020 at position(-6.5, 20.5) [WORKING].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51021 at position(-2.5, 20.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51022 at position(-0.5, 21.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51027 at position(-3.5, 23.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51026 at position(-7.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51031 at position(3.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51030 at position(2.5, 24.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=51033 at position(-0.5, 28.5) [EMPTY].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System for the Boiler:
  • Wooden chest placed at position(-4.5, 25.5) intended for fuel storage and fuel delivery (holds 5 coal).
  • Attempts to place a burner inserter adjacent to the chest (using both Direction.RIGHT and Direction.LEFT) were made but failed due to placement collisions with existing pipes.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Issues:
  • Dynamically validate available PipeGroup fluid_system identifiers and confirm they are active when connecting boiler outputs to the Steam Engine.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • Regularly monitor boiler fuel levels and ensure timely replenishment to avoid prolonged NO_FUEL status.
- Fuel Chest Placement Errors:
  • Verify that chosen target positions for fuel chest placement are free of obstructions and within the allowed placement distance.
- Variable Definition Errors:
  • Ensure that all entity variables (for example, the fuel chest) are properly defined and referenced consistently to prevent NameError exceptions.
- Burner Inserter Placement Errors:
  • Prior to placing burner inserters adjacent to fuel chests, check that the adjacent tiles are unoccupied; adjust spacing or change placement direction as necessary to avoid collisions with existing entities.
